Product.Title: Casio Exilim EX-S100
Product.ProductInfo: 9.7 MB internal memory; compatible with Secure Digital (SD) and MultiMedia (MMC) memory cards. Powered by rechargeable lithium-ion battery; connects to PCs and Macs via USB 1.1.

Product.Title: Canon PowerShot S1
Product.TagLine: 3.2 MP Digital Camera with 10x Image Stabilized Optical Zoom
Product.ProductInfo: Store images on Compact Flash Type I or II memory cards (32 MB card included). Powered by 4 AA-size batteries (alkaline included, rechargeable NiMH recommended).

Product.Title: Olympus Camedia D535
Product.ProductInfo: Save images and videos with 12 MB of internal memory or using a compatible xD-Picture Card. Easy USB connectivity and PictBridge technology for convenient printing on the spot.

Product.Title: Kodak EasyShare DX7630
Product.ProductInfo: Store images in 32MB of internal memory or on optional Secure Digital memory cards (memory card not included). Powered by rechargeable EasyShare lithium-ion battery (included with charger).

Product.Title: Konica Minolta Dimage Z10
Product.ProductInfo: Powered by 4 AA-size batteries (alkaline included; rechargeable NiMH recommended). 3-megapixel sensor captures enough detail to create photo-quality 10-by-13-inch enlargements.
